data.comment: The match has started at McDiarmid Park.
At McDiarmid Park, Olivier Ntcham has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 19, St Johnstone's David Wotherspoon has been booked in Perth.
Nick Walsh blows to end the first-half.
Nick Walsh has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 49, David Turnbull (Celtic) gets a yellow card.
Ryan Christie is on a sub for David Turnbull for Celtic.
The away team have replaced Odsonne Edouard with Patryk Klimala. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Lennon.
In the minute 67, Michael O`Halloran is replacing David Wotherspoon for St Johnstone at McDiarmid Park.
Murray Davidson (St Johnstone) has received a yellow card from Nick Walsh.
Neil Lennon (Celtic) is making a fourth substitution, with Tom Rogic replacing Mohamed Elyounoussi.
In the minute 76, Neil Lennon is making the team's third substitution at McDiarmid Park with Leigh Griffiths replacing Olivier Ntcham.
The away team replace Greg Taylor with Scott Brown.
The match has come to a close in Perth. The final score is 0-2.
Goal! Celtic take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Leigh Griffiths.
Hatem Elhamed with an assist there.
Callum Davidson is making the team's second substitution at McDiarmid Park with Callum Hendry replacing Jason Kerr.
Great finish from Patryk Klimala to give Celtic a 0-2 lead.
